alert.note: Alert for Riverside County Mountains; San Bernardino County Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 22 at 8:41AM PST until January 22 at 10:00PM PST by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM PST THIS EVENING ABOVE 6500 FEET... * WHAT...Snow above 6,500 feet. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 6 inches, with additional snowfall in excess of 6 inches mainly over mountain passes above 7,000 feet in elevation. * WHERE...San Bernardino County Mountains and Riverside County Mountains. * WHEN...Until 10 PM PST this evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For road condition information in California...enter 8 0 0 4 2 7 7 6 2 3 if inside california or 9 1 6 4 5 5 7 6 2 3 if outside California.

area.areaDesc: Riverside County Mountains; San Bernardino County Mountains
